search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Baserow (baserow.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official Baserow pricing page URL is: [https://baserow.io/pricing](https://baserow.io/pricing)【3:0†source】.

**Free forever.**  
Pay as you grow.
====================================

The right plan for everyone.

Cloud **(we host)** Self-host **(you host)**

Billed yearly

![Image 6](https://baserow.io/_nuxt/img/free-plan-icon.47cd21a.svg)

### Free

For individuals and small teams

**$0**

[Get started](https://baserow.io/signup)Plan includes:

*   Unlimited databases
*   3,000 rows per workspace
*   2GB of storage per workspace
*   Grid, Form & Gallery views
*   Library of 65+ templates

Most popular

![Image 7](https://baserow.io/_nuxt/img/premium-plan-icon.21e7f8a.svg)

### Premium

For growing teams

**$10** per user/month  
billed yearly

**$12** billed monthly

[Get started](https://baserow.io/subscriptions/new)Everything in Free, plus:

*   50,000 rows per workspace
*   20GB of storage per workspace
*   Kanban, Survey & Calendar views
*   XML & JSON export
*   Row comments & coloring

Free trial

![Image 8](https://baserow.io/_nuxt/img/advanced-plan-icon.f7857d2.svg)

### Advanced

For scaling businesses

**$20** per user/month  
billed yearly

**$22** billed monthly

[Try now for free](https://baserow.io/dashboard)Everything in Premium, plus:

*   250,000 rows per workspace
*   100GB of storage per workspace
*   Role based permissions
*   Free read/comment users
*   Audit logs
